description: Search for the term you want, or look through the list of all available terms. You may also check the 'search all' box to search through both names and descriptions of glossary terms (this is especially helpful if you don't know exactly what you're searching for). If you want to search for any of a number of words, enable 'multi-searching' by clicking the multi-search symbol button.
Click on a term and to focus on it.
